article_title: Pharmacies to begin prescribing birth control under new state law
article_text:
00:59 Lock it up: Medicine safety in your home Pause

01:11 Brain-dead Vacaville toddler leaves U.S. for treatment, attorney says

article_metadata.title: Pharmacies to begin prescribing birth control under new state law | The Sacramento Bee

og.description: As early as this fall, California women who have long had to schedule a doctor’s appointment for a birth control prescription will be able to go straight to the pharmacy for the contraception.
og.title: Pharmacies to begin prescribing birth control under new state law
